name: Soulen with a silent 'T'
description:
SOULEN

with a silent 't'

Ah crap! Your soul got stoulen!
That evil son of a witch called Deprital has stolen your soul after you accidentally entered her cabin....changing your body into a skeletal form! Use your newfound skeleton powers to your advantage and make your way to reclaim your soul!

Ending not included, will be included in the 5k DLC.

currently health system doesnt work because i wanted to sleep xD even though i had the building bricks for it and the timer also doesnt to anything yet.... will be introduced in patch 2.0, I hope you enjoy the mechanics/world/art that we have! =)

Make sure to play starting from level 1 as we got a suprise there at the start!

CONTROLS

WASD = Move

Left click = attack

Right click = throw arm

When your arm is thrown you cant attack though :)

Xavaltir: Programming,VFX, everything Unity related

Leeroid: Sprites, Animations, everything art related
